Mithril daggers are the fifth strongest daggers in RuneScape, the next strongest being the adamant dagger. Like all mithril weapons, mithril daggers require 20 Attack to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be poisoned. Players can purchase this dagger from the Varrock Swordshop.

The mithril dagger is a dagger made out of mithril. Mithril daggers can be smithed from a single mithril bar at level 50 Smithing. Each mithril dagger created grants 50 experience. Mithril daggers are the fifth strongest daggers in RuneScape, the next strongest being the adamant dagger. Like all mithril weapons, mithril daggers require 20 Attack to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be poisoned. Players can purchase this dagger from the Varrock Swordshop.

A mithril dagger is one of the items obtained when unlocking the Muddy chest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril dagger(+)" to "Mithril dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril dagger(s)" to "Mithril dagger(p++)".

The '''mithril dagger''' is a [[dagger]] made out of [[mithril equipment|mithril]]. Mithril daggers can be smithed from a single [[mithril bar]] at level 50 [[Smithing]]. Each mithril dagger created grants 50 experience. Mithril daggers are the fifth strongest daggers in ''[[RuneScape]]'', the next strongest being the [[adamant dagger]]. Like all mithril weapons, mithril daggers require 20 [[Attack]] to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be [[poison]]ed. Players can purchase this dagger from the [[Varrock Swordshop]].

A mithril dagger is one of the items obtained when unlocking the [[Muddy chest]].
